name: Custom Thank you for Woo
author: SunArc

sections.description:
A thank you order confirmation page expands the customer relationship to show all order details on the respective page. This is the fastest and easiest ways to improve overall marketing response.

The Custom Thank you and order confirmation page plugin display to customers details after order completing with information. This plugin offers admin personalisation of thank you order confirmation page with heading size, Logo, heading color, style and for enable header. The admin can customize it page as per his requirement of the store

Features of Plugin

1.To provide admin personalisation of thank you order confirmation page
2. Can upload logo from the backend to show on Thank you page
3. Can set color and style from the backend as per own creativity experience

A brief Markdown Example

For most Ecommerce marketers, a thank you page is nothing more than a means to express their acknowledgment to their users for making a purchase on their website But, a thank you page has the prowess to encourage prospects to take many other desired actions on ecommerce website than just accepting your acknowledgement.

The default Woo Commerce thank you page / Woo Commerce order complete page is very simple. Therefore, this is the best time to use that feeling and interest for end user.

Use Cases of Woo Commerce Custom Thank you & Order Confirmation Page

  1. Keeping visitors engaged.
    2 .Providing a website experience so they’ll remember the ecommerce website
  2. Create Brand loyalty
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the Word Press plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the /Plugins/ screen in Word Press
  3. Settings/Woo commerce settings->Woo Commerce Custom Thank you & Order Confirmation Page
    1) Create setting page for redirection to the custom thank you page .
    2) Create a setting page for header and footer.
    3) Create a setting page for styling.
sections.faq:
What are the basic advantages of this plugin?

The basic purpose of this plugin is to provide admin personalisation of thank you order confirmation page with heading size, Logo, heading color, style and for enable header. The admin can customize it page as per his requirement of the store

Is this a free plugin of Woo Commerce Custom Thank you & Order Confirmation Page ?

Yes, this is a free plugin of Woo Commerce Custom Thank you & Order Confirmation Page. This provides personalisation of order confirmation thank you page.

What word press version Woo Commerce Custom Thank you & Order Confirmation Page plugin supports?

Currently, this product supports the word press version till the 5.6 Version.
